Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 16 points in a 21-0 run by the Los Angeles Lakers to start the 4th quarter
Domantas Sabonis finished with 29 points, 12 rebounds, 10 assists, 1 steal and 1 block
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Lakers to win based on their recent performance
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed by 30 minutes due to a power outage
Others: The Kings struggled defensively, particularly in the 4th quarter, and their offense was discombobulated during that stretch
